frontMatter.title: 《為什麼要睡覺》
frontMatter.summary: 今天的讀的書《為什麼要睡覺》，心得要來分享一本探討睡眠的書，原文書名是 #WhyWeSleep，讀了以後嚇到我！書中知識不只提醒人睡覺的好處，更警告你如果沒有充足的睡眠，人生會有多慘！

prev.title: Free Python course material
prev.summary: Free Python course materials! I put in a FOIA request to the NSA for their Python training materials and got back a 400-page printout of their COMP 3321 training course. So, I scanned and OCR'd it. Here is a PDF (warning: 118 MB) https://t.co/i1Fxe6G4MJ

next.summary: A Collection of application ideas which can be used to improve your coding skills.
